pros:
Automated Business Designs offers their employees full benefits including health, 401K, vacation / personal time. Benefits are paid and the 401K plan is well thought out and quite unique to the advantage of the employee.
The environment is one where everyone does get to know each other and on a daily basis you get to work with other individuals in the office.
You are never bored. All positions within the organization provide new challenges every day whether it be writing or learning a new piece of the software, working with a new client, or just trying to solve the "now how did that happen?" or "how do I do that" questions of the day.
It is a team atmosphere where you are really never alone. When help is needed the support of the whole office is there to assist.
Special events happen all the time in the office to break up the day/week even if only for 15-30 minutes.
cons:
Cons are how you look at them.
If you are someone who says this is the way I do it, then this is not the place for you. Group decisions / recommendations / advice from everyone are all part of this company.
If you are someone who is not self-motivated or a self-starter, needs someone to plan your day for you, then this is not the place for you. You need to know how to keep yourself going and know when you need to put the time in even if it is beyond office hours.

pros: ABD is an organization that has high standards in all that they do. Management is encouraging and positive. ABD is the type of organization that looks to its employees to question the status quo, and improve what and how we do things every step of the way. All levels of staff are encouraged to participate in special projects or request time to spearhead a new idea or initiative. ABD has also built an incredible staff of intelligent and committed individuals who I enjoy partnering with each and every day. My time with ABD has been very rewarding, and positive.
cons: To succeed at ABD you must be able to self manage, and you need to be proactive. It's actually what provides so much opportunity for the right person.

review_title: Fun and fast paced - not a stodgy corporate environment!
years_at_company: Fun and fast paced - not a stodgy corporate environment!
pros: Like most progressive software companies, ABD is a fast-paced environment, never boring, nor repetitive. The people are fun, and know how to have fun while working hard at the same time. There are always new products being introduced, and monthly 'learning sessions' keep the employees involved with the products being offered. Great benefits, including 100% paid insurance, 401k, paid vacation/sick time, and company events. A solid company to work for.
cons: There are times of the year that are busier than others -- which can be somewhat stressful -- but upper management is always available, approachable, and willing to help out.

pros: A leader in staffing software solutions. Excellent work environment. Great internal team to work and collaborate with. Innovative company that is constantly developing new products and pushing into new software frontiers. Good location right by Rosemont’s entertainment complex. Outstanding job benefits. Comprehensive health insurance coverage is provided for free for all employees. In addition, there is a 401(k) plan, monthly team events, and complimentary fitness club memberships for all.
cons: Must be tech savvy to stay on top of new offerings and developments. Although it can be fast paced, I get the sense that all employees are truly valued. A solid management structure ensures that there is a clear line of communication between employees and supervisors.

pros: You receive training in a classroom environment before getting thrown into real situations with clients. Decent salary and benefits.
cons: You will have no time outside of work and are expected to work constantly. Management is rude and I have seen situations that should NEVER occur on the job. They do not have enough employees to take on the work load and most clients are complaining way more than actually liking the software.

review_title: Growing company w. a very rewarding, team oriented culture. Goes above & beyond for employees and customer service.
years_at_company: Growing company w. a very rewarding, team oriented culture. Goes above & beyond for employees and customer service.
pros: Great opportunities for advancement since the company is growing. Offers a collaborative and fun team environment. The company has been an industry leader for 30 years, the foundation for great job stability. There is a strong focus on the client and customer service, the company will do anything to ensure client satisfaction. Management is open to new ideas and will genuinely listen to any type of employee concern. You can tell that management cares about and values each and every employee. Automated Business Designs is an awesome place to work!
cons: Very fast paced environment. Employees are constantly challenged, since things to do not stay constant in the world of technology. Employees must be able to adapt to change quickly and always be more than a step ahead of the curve...which is not a bad thing!
